defined.documentation: Type of ocean model.

defined.documentation: Basic approximations made in the ocean.

defined.documentation: List of prognostic variables in the ocean component.

defined.documentation: Type of EOS for sea water

defined.documentation: Temperature used in EOS for sea water

defined.documentation: Salinity used in EOS for sea water

defined.documentation: Depth or pressure used in EOS for sea water ?

defined.name: ocean_freezing_point
defined.documentation: Equation used to compute the freezing point (in deg C) of seawater, as a function of salinity and pressure

defined.name: ocean_specific_heat
defined.documentation: Specific heat in ocean (cpocean) in J/(kg K)

defined.name: ocean_reference_density
defined.documentation: Boussinesq reference density (rhozero) in kg / m3

defined.name: reference_dates
defined.documentation: Reference date of bathymetry

defined.name: type
defined.documentation: Is the bathymetry fixed in time in the ocean ?

defined.documentation: Describe any smoothing or hand editing of bathymetry in ocean

defined.documentation: Describe source of bathymetry in ocean

defined.name: isolated_seas
defined.documentation: Describe if/how isolated seas is performed

defined.documentation: Describe if/how river mouth mixing or estuaries specific treatment is performed

defined.name: repository
defined.documentation: Location of code for this component.

defined.name: code_version
defined.documentation: Code version identifier.

defined.name: code_languages
defined.documentation: Code language(s).

defined.name: name
defined.documentation: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid, e.g. ORCA025, N512L180, T512L70 etc.

defined.name: canonical_horizontal_resolution
defined.documentation: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

defined.name: number_of_horizontal_gridpoints
defined.documentation: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

defined.name: number_of_vertical_levels
defined.documentation: Number of vertical levels resolved on computational grid.

defined.name: is_adaptive_grid
defined.documentation: Default is False. Set true if grid resolution changes during execution.

defined.name: thickness_level_1
defined.documentation: Thickness of first surface ocean level (in meters)

defined.name: description
defined.documentation: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained. &Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, &and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle &with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

defined.name: global_mean_metrics_used
defined.documentation: List set of metrics of the global mean state used in tuning model/component

defined.name: regional_metrics_used
defined.documentation: List of regional metrics of mean state (e.g THC, AABW, regional means etc) used in tuning model/component

defined.name: trend_metrics_used
defined.documentation: List observed trend metrics used in tuning model/component

defined.name: description
defined.documentation: Brief description of conservation methodology

defined.name: scheme
defined.documentation: Properties conserved in the ocean by the numerical schemes

defined.name: consistency_properties
defined.documentation: Any additional consistency properties (energy conversion, pressure gradient discretisation, ...)?

defined.name: corrected_conserved_prognostic_variables
defined.documentation: Set of variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.

defined.name: was_flux_correction_used
defined.documentation: Does conservation involved flux correction ?
